title: Himi 538
lyrics:
7.6.7.6.7.7.7.6.
1.
‘Eiki, ‘oku ke ‘ofa’i
He meʻa kotoa pē:
‘Uma’ā ‘a Ho kakai,
Ka nau ka tangi hake.
Hangē tofu ‘emau fai,
Ka kole fānau ki he fa’ē,
Pehē pē ho’ fakaai
Homau masiva ē.
2.
‘Oku hā foʻou Ho’ ‘ofa
He ‘aho fulipē;
‘A’ahi ki he me’a kotoa
Ke fakatu’umālie.
Si’o ‘ofa’anga ē
Tangata lotu Tohitapu:
Lama hono topuvaʻe
Mo tauhi hono lau.
3.
Ka ko hai ‘e lau Ho’ ‘ofa,
‘A e ‘ofa mōifua?
‘A e foaki si’o Foha
Ma’a homau maama lusa.
Ko e toko kilu mano
Kuo fakamolemole ai;
Kuo tonu ke mau hao,
‘O lava ki he langi.
4.
Pea ‘oku Ne kei ui
Fa’ahinga fulipē,
Ke nau haʻu ‘o maʻu moʻui
‘I honau laumālie.
‘Ene faka’amu ia
Ne hifo ai na ‘o lī’oa,
Ke toloto monū’ia
‘A e ‘atamai kotoa. *
